<h1 align="center">
  Pod-Point app
</h1>


## ðŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Clone the application.**

    Run following command

    ```shell
    git clone https://github.com/Pod-Point/ecommerce-web-app.git
    ```

1.  **Install the node module.**

    Navigate into the project folder and run command.

    ```shell
    cd ecommerce-web-app/
    npm install
    ```

1.  **Configurate .env**

    Copy the file .env.example to .env and add keys for prismic repository and BigCommerce.

1.  **Run the application**

    run command:

    ```shell
    npm run develop
    ```

    or

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```

1.  **Existing application**

    Synchrony your application with github run this command:

    ```shell
    git pull origin master
    ```

    if there is any changes in **`package.json`** run:

    ```shell
    npm install
    ```

    clean the cache application run:

    ```shell
    gatsby clean
    ```

    run the applcaition:

    run command:

    ```shell
    npm run develop
    ```

    or

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    ```
